com.florianingerl.util.regex

Class DefaultCaptureReplacer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.florianingerl.util.regex.DefaultCaptureReplacer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CaptureReplacer

    public class DefaultCaptureReplacer
extends Object
implements CaptureReplacer
    A reasonable default implementation of CaptureReplacer.

    A CaptureTreeNode is replaced by the replacement strings of all its children (ignoring those inside lookarounds) and the text in between the children.

    Author:
    Florian Ingerl
    See Also:
    Matcher.replaceAll(CaptureReplacer)
